context_blocks.content: Executive Command Center consists of a KPI Ribbon (Total AUM, Active Deals, Pipeline Value, Investor Count, Revenue MTD) plus 8 dashboard cards: Deal Pipeline (Wix CMS → Power BI), Investor Activity (NDAs + Activity Log), Financial Performance (Business Central), CRM & Sales (Dynamics 365), Project & Asset Management (Wix CMS + Planner), Marketing & Content (Wix Analytics + CRM), Document Intelligence (SharePoint + Activity Log), AI Operations Monitor (All Agent Platforms).
Three surface options: Power BI Service (primary, full interactive with drill-down), Microsoft Teams Tab (embedded for meetings and standup), SharePoint Page (widget for document-centric workflows).

Deal Pipeline KPIs: funnel by status stage, asset class distribution, weighted average cap rate, geographic heat map, days-in-stage tracking. Investor KPIs: NDA submissions by deal, investor type segmentation, access grant conversion rate, document engagement, return visitor analysis. Financial KPIs: capital commitments, fee schedule/earned revenue, portfolio IRR, cash flow/distributions, budget vs actual variance. AI Ops KPIs: agent utilization rates, workflow completion, error/retry tracking, API call volumes/latency, cost per operation.

decisions.decision: Power BI designated as primary dashboard surface with Teams and SharePoint as secondary surfaces
decisions.rationale: Power BI provides full interactive drill-down capability; Teams and SharePoint provide contextual access
decisions.impact: All reporting consolidates through Power BI; team members access via their preferred surface

decisions.decision: Single-pane-of-glass design with 8 dashboard cards + KPI ribbon
decisions.rationale: Unified view prevents context switching; all verticals report into one view
decisions.impact: Executive decision-making supported by real-time cross-vertical data

action_items.action: Design Power BI data model connecting all source systems
Embed Power BI dashboard in Teams and SharePoint
